root.message: All metadata fields for the indicator 13-2-1, translated into en
root.data: Objective 13. Take urgent action to combat climate change and its repercussions213.2 Incorporate climate change measures into national policies, strategies and planning13.2.1 Number of national communications prepared on the implementation of the policy aimed at improving climate change5/1/2020 12:00:00 AMMinistry of the Environment, Agriculture and LivestockMBAZUMUTIMANA DieudonneStatistical serviceSDG focal point within the Ministry79548570dembaze@yahoo.frThis is the number of national communications prepared on the implementation of the policy aimed at improving climate changeNumberAnnual report on the achievements of the OBPEAdministrative dataAnnualAnnualMINEAGRIEMINEAGRIEThe Ministerial departments are the members of the SSN whose mission is to collect, process and disseminate the data of their sector.The indicator is relevant because it reflects the state of environmental protectionThe exhaustiveness of this indicator depends on the regular reporting of the activities carried out in this area.Count of national communications prepared on the implementation of the policy aimed at improving climate changeThis indicator is validated internally onlyThe indicator is available at national levelThe indicator can be compared to other indicators of the same type at regional and international levelNational Communication 2011
